body.p: Sir: We have received from Dr. Felix Flugel, Agent in Leipsic for the system of exchanges conducted by this Institution, an account of charges against Geological Survey of Ky amounting to $2.75, for expenses incurred by him personally, in forwarding books to you during the years 1858, 1859, and 1860.
We therefore respectfully request that you will forward us the above sum, (in postage stamps,) and oblige,

Very respectfully,
Your obedient servant,
JOSEPH HENRY,
Secretary.
